altTitles.ja: バクシンお嬢様道！

description.en: Sakuraba Sakurako is at the entrance ceremony of Neo Mogitori Academy, a school for training young ladies. She tries to enter the school with a dog as her companion, but the teacher stops her and she ends up fighting the dog. Sakurako narrowly wins the battle and meets the boys and girls who will work hard together to become the ultimate ojou-sama.

altTitles.en: Isshiki-san Wants to Know About Love.

altTitles.ja-ro: Koutetsu no Rinna wa XX Saretai.

altTitles.ja: 一式さんは恋を知りたい。
鋼鉄のリンナは××されたい

altTitles.zh-hk: 一式小姐想要知曉戀愛。

altTitles.zh-ro: Gāngtiě zhí nǚ xiǎng bèi xx
Yīshì xiǎojiě xiǎng yào zhīxiǎo liàn'ài.
Gāngtiě de lín nà xiǎng bèi xx

altTitles.vi: Isshiki-san muốn biết yêu là gì

description.en:
A maiden who doesn't know what love is tries her hand at dating as a pseudo-couple!

Inspector Rinna, who is respected by everyone as a hard-working and serious policewoman, seems to be having trouble with her work lately. The reason for this is because she loses focus. It only happens when Meishi, the detective she works with, is around… So, she makes a choice…?
description.ja:
堅物で真面目な警察官だと周りから尊敬されている一式警部は、最近どうも仕事がうまくいかないご様子。
その原因は一緒に仕事をしている探偵・六反田がいる時にばかり起こってしまう…。
とあることから悩みの原因が判明した彼女は、問題を解決すべく六反田探偵と擬似カップルとして付き合うことになったが…？
恋を知らない乙女が擬似カップルとしてお付き合いに大挑戦な、ラブコメディ！

※2話目まで旧タイトル「鋼鉄のリンナは××されたい」表記となります。
description.pt-br:
Uma donzela que não sabe o que é o amor, experimenta o namoro como um pseudo-casal!

A inspectora Rinna, que é respeitada por todos como uma agente policial trabalhadora e séria, parece estar a ter problemas com o seu trabalho ultimamente. A razão para isto é porque ela perde o foco. Isto só acontece quando Meishi, o detective com quem ela trabalha, está por perto. Então, ela faz uma escolha…?

altTitles.ja: 今日もベランダで

altTitles.vi: Lại gặp nhau ở ban công rồi

description.en: A freelance designer loves to relax from work through gardening on his balcony. There he starts talking to his new neighbor next door over the wall without knowing her face.
description.ja: フリーのエディトリアルデザイナー・土岐田旬は、仕事に追われ部屋に籠りっぱなしの毎日。癒やしを求めてベランダガーデニングにハマるように。そんなある日、隣にちょっと変わった天然系の女性が引っ越してきた。ふとした出来事から、お互いの顔も知らぬままベランダの隔壁越しに話をするようになる二人。実は隣の女性は新進俳優・成海游なのだが……。ベランダとグリーンが繋ぐ隔壁越しの二人は？
description.ru:
Фрилансер дизайнер-редактор Сюн Токита настолько занят своей работой, что целыми днями сидит взаперти в своей квартире. В поисках отдыха он пристрастился к балконному садоводству. Однажды по соседству с ним поселяется необычная женщина природной красоты. Они начинают разговаривать через стенку балкона, не зная друг друга в лицо. На самом деле соседка — восходящая актриса Ю Наруми...
Балкон и зелень объединяют их через перегородку.
description.uk: Дизайнер-фрілансер любить відпочивати від роботи, займаючись садівництвом на своєму балконі. Там він починає розмовляти зі своєю новою сусідкою через стіну, не знаючи її в обличчя.

altTitles.ja: カレとカノジョの選択

description.en:
A new relationship begins after a seven year reunion!  
  
After being separated for seven years between Hokkaido and Tokyo, a young man waits at the airport to reunite with his best friend. However, what arrives instead is a message from his best friend saying he will be late, and a mysterious beauty! The ever-spirited mangaka, Hiroki Ohara, makes his debut on Comic Newtype!
description.ja: 北海道と東京――離れ離れになってから７年、青年は中学以来に再会する親友を待っていた。そんな彼に届いたのは、遅刻を詫びる親友からのメール、そして謎の美女だった。 気鋭の漫画家・緖原博綺がついにコミックNTに初登場！
description.ko:
어른이 되면 너를 만나러 갈게──.
그 약속을 가슴에 품고, 7년만에 재회한 ‘그’는 ‘그녀’가 되어 있었다?!
이제는 다른 성별이 되어버린 상황에서 동거를 시작한 두 친구의 우정이 향하는 방향은 어디일까?
상쾌한 터치로 그려낸 TS 청춘 스토리, 코믹 레인 신작 ‘그와 그녀의 선택’.
description.zh-hk: 太刀花和真與宮之下遙是從小學就在一起的好朋友。遙在班上大受歡迎，而且很有義氣，實力也不差，因此常常幫助雖然身材高大，但個性比較懦弱的和真。兩人上了國中，因為和真轉學的關係而分開了，但這兩位好友約定好長大之後要再次見面。就這樣過了7年，雖然一直有在聯絡，但兩人的關係漸漸變得有點疏遠的某一天，遙突然告訴和真要到東京找他。經過一番波折之後，兩人終於睽違7年見面了，但是沒想到…遙卻從男生變成女生了！

description.en: Beyond the borders of the kingdom of Yarke, is the blighted land of Uren. Peasants and nobility listen with open ears as travelers recount tales of witchcraft under the moonlight. As tensions mount, the third prince of Yarke travels outside of his kingdom under a full moon only to encounter a beautiful woman. While the prince is charmed by her graceful appearance, she isn't all that he seems.
description.es: Au-delà des frontières du royaume de Yarke, se trouve la terre brûlée d'Uren. Les paysans et la noblesse écoutent les oreilles ouvertes tandis que les voyageurs racontent des histoires de sorcellerie au clair de lune. Alors que les tensions montent, le troisième prince de Yarke voyage hors de son royaume sous la pleine lune pour rencontrer une belle femme. Alors que le prince est charmé par son apparence gracieuse, elle n'est pas du tout ce qu'elle semble être. Ou, devrions nous dire, il ?

altTitles.ja: オフヴィレッジ 第三防御壁

description.en:
In that village, those who die rise again, transforming into what the locals call "Wandering Dead" that are neither fully alive nor completely dead. These wandering dead then feast on the living...

In the remote settlement of Sarugami Village, completely isolated from the outside world by three imposing walls and absent from all maps, an eerie phenomenon unfolds. The villagers know nothing of the outside world, they can only resist the suffocating scent of death that permeates their lives... It's a bizarre horror where conspiracy and madness intertwine.

title.en: Gorin no Megami-sama ~Nadeshiko Ryou no Medal Gohan~

altTitles.ja: 五輪の女神さま 〜なでしこ寮のメダルごはん〜

altTitles.en: Olympic Goddess: Nadeshiko Dormitory Medal Rice

altTitles.ru: Богиня Олимпийских игр: Медаль общежития Надесико Райс

description.en: The main character, Kominato Ryo, who is only engaged in cooking, was allowed to enter the prestigious Cho Gakuen Private School on the condition that he work as a cook in a student dormitory under the supervision of his father. However, the “dormitory” was the women's dormitory where future gold medal candidates lived. The nutritional requirements of top athletes are naturally high. Fill their stomachs and take on the challenging mission of building your body for the Olympic Games!
description.ja: 料理だけが取り柄の小湊は、父の取り計らいにより、学生寮の炊事担当として文武両道の超有名高校への特別入学を許可された。だが、その学生寮とは未来の金メダル候補生が住む“女子寮”だった！ 美人アスリートJKたちの食に対するハイレベルな要求に応えて、五輪出場のための最高の身体作りをサポートせよ！！

altTitles.en: Beneath the Surviving Princess' Joyful Façade
Behind the Laughter of the Surviving Princess

altTitles.es-la: Detrás de la sonrisa de la reina superviviente

altTitles.th: เบื้องหลังรอยยิ้มของเจ้าหญิง

altTitles.zh: 活下来的王女的笑容背后

description.en:
When the king offers Aerik Cladinae his own sister's hand in marriage for his meritorious deeds in battle, he didn't expect to get saddled with a limping, drooling woman like Miesa Esquillre.

Driven insane by her brother's physical and psychological torture, Miesa rolls around on the ground, spills food all over herself, and screams unintelligebly as a way of communicating. But sometimes, Aerik catches a flash of shrewd understanding behind those vacant eyes.

Is Miesa truly as mad as everyone thinks... or is she hiding something?

title.en: I Don't Want to Be a Lady

description.en:
Before being sold as the Crown Prince’s concubine, I proposed a contract marriage to the Duke.

“Will your father allow you to marry me?”
“Of course not. So there is only one way.”

“We have to make an accident.”

It will taste better when I break that mol*ster’s head.
I could shoot a gun at the alley gangster. Even the prince of the neighboring empire was also knocked out by me.

The man snorted.

“You’re so arrogant as the captive subject. I never knew that Count Bornes would be a jerk to his dog.”

I said with a smile, “Our mansion didn’t have a dog. Because the owner of the mansion is already a dog.”

This is the story of Arianne Bornes, who seemed to be a villainess but not a villainess.
description.ko:
망나니 황태자의 정부로 팔려가기 전, 공작에게 계약 결혼을 제안했다.

“당신의 부친께서 저와의 혼인을 허락해 주실까요?”
“아니죠. 그러니 방법은 하나뿐이에요.”

“사고를 쳐야죠.”

치한은 머리를 깨줘야 맛.
골목 건달에게는 총알을 박아주고
이웃 나라 황자도 때려눕혔다.


남자가 코웃음 쳤다.

“포로로 잡힌 주제에 건방지기는. 보르네스라면 그 집 개새끼까지 싸가지 없을 것 같단 말이지.”

아리안느가 싱긋 웃으며 말했다.

“우리 집엔 개 안 키워. 이미 주인이 개새끼잖아.”

악녀인 듯 악녀 아닌 악녀 같은 그녀, 아리안느 보르네스의 파란만장 스토리.

altTitles.ja: デッドロック

description.en:
The latest series by Hiro Mashima is a Demon World Academy Dark Fantasy!!
DEAD ROCK is a demon king training institution that towers over the depths of the demon world.
Yakuto, a young demon, challenges the harsh entrance exam to knock on the doors of DEAD ROCK!!
description.fr: DEAD ROCK se déroule au sein de l'académie sombre et fantastique du même nom, un institut d'entraînement pour les rois démons qui gouvernent les abysses du monde des démons. C'est là que Yakuto, un jeune résident du monde des démons, se lance dans le défi des examens d'admission.
description.ja:
デッドロック、それは魔界の深層にそびえたつ魔王養成機関。
魔界人の若者であるヤクトは、デッドロックの門戸をたたくため、過酷な入学試験に挑む!!

title.en: I Will Not Be The Supporting Character Forever

altTitles.ja: 永遠の脇役なんていない

altTitles.en: There Is No Eternal Supporting Character

description.en:
“Why a supporting character instead of the main character?! And out of all supporting characters, why must I be this girl…” When she came to, she was in the middle of the novel, [Empress Rosalynne], as the supporting priest character, “Elena”. Moreover, the story starts right after Elena messed up a holy ritual and she was treated awfully by everyone around her… “There’s only one way to get out of this! I have to become the tutor of the Emperor’s little brother, Duke Levi!”

Elena thought she could watch over the protagonist of the story, Rosalynne, as the events of the story unfolded at the imperial court, but something was wrong. “Equality between commoners and me, a noble? You better watch yourself!” The protagonist she had admired so much was a villainess that discriminated against others based on their social status.

“I won’t be able to stand it if everything ends up the way she wants!” And so, Elena resolves to change how the story unfolds.

Can she rise from her role as a supporting character and claim the position of protagonist?!

title.en: Gyaru Maid to Akuyaku Reijou ~Ojou-sama no Happy End shika Katan!~

altTitles.ja: ギャルメイドと悪役令嬢 ～おじょーさまのハッピーエンドしか勝たん！～

altTitles.en: Gal Maid & Villainess: Only Milady's Happy End Will Win!

altTitles.pl: Modna Służka i Antagonistka: Liczy Się Tylko Pomyślność Mojej Pani!

description.en: A gyaru named Serina is reincarnated into the world of an otome game as a background character who is sold off by her family and now works as the exclusive maid of the game's villainess Almelia. Yuri romcom hijinks ensue.
description.ja: ギャルのセリナが転生したのは、オタクな友達に激推しされてハマった乙女ゲームの世界だった！モブキャラに転生していたセリナは親の借金のカタで売られ、悪役令嬢・アルメリアのもとでメイドをすることになるが…。
description.pl: Gyaru o imieniu Serina zostaje reinkarnowana w świecie gry otome jako postać drugoplanowa, która zostaje sprzedana przez swoją rodzinę i teraz pracuje jako ekskluzywna pokojówka złoczyńcy Almelii. Yuri romcom
description.pt-br: Uma gyaru chamada Serina é reencarnada no mundo de um Otome game (jogo de "namoro"), como uma personagem secundária que é vendida por sua família e agora trabalha como a empregada exclusiva da vilã do jogo, Almelia. Confusões românticas Yuri de forma hilariantes se desdobram.

altTitles.ja: 美味しんぼ

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

title.en: The Male Lead Is Trying to Change the Female Lead

altTitles.en: The Hero Is Trying to Change the Heroine

altTitles.fr: Le principal masculin essaie de changer la principale féminin
Le héros essaie de changer la heroïne

altTitles.es: ¿El protagonista masculino está tratando de cambiar a la protagonista femenina?

altTitles.ja: 脇役のはずが、主人公に求婚されています

description.en:
I ended up possessing the body of an extra named Luberia, who is barely mentioned in the story. And right in the tragic novel *Emperor Caesar*, full of wars and disasters, where the protagonist sacrifices everything for the love of the hero and everyone ends up dying! I planned to live discreetly and hide my strength... 

But the male lead, Caesar, keeps looking for me and even proposes marriage, saying he wants to keep me around. Luberia doesn't want to meet the same tragic end as the protagonist, so she tries to avoid Caesar at all costs... But due to Caesar's intimidating appearance and assertiveness, before she knows it, she ends up engaged to him. 

Will Luberia manage not to fall in love with Caesar and survive until the end?
description.es: Quedé poseída por la extra 'Ruberia' cuyo nombre apenas se mencionaba. ¡Por qué, en la empobrecida novela <César se convierte en Emperador>, que está llena de guerras y accidentes, y donde la protagonista femenina se sacrifica por el protagonista masculino y todos mueren! Había planeado ocultar mis fuerzas y vivir en silencio y en silencio... El protagonista masculino, "César", sigue visitando a Ruberia e incluso le pide que se case con él, diciendo que quiere mantenerla a su lado.

title.en: I Want to Live a Good Life

description.en: The best in the world, excellent martial arts, overflowing money and pleasure----the center of the magical world, Black Astronomy. Kang Hee-ran, the granddaughter of the owner of Heukcheonmun, lives a life that has nothing to lack and nothing to be envied of, but dies at the hands of her stepmother. And for some reason, Heeran reverted to her younger self! In the life that started again, she goes down quietly and kindly with her warm nanny. The first step of revenge begins with making the third Confucius, Kang Lun, the king of the underworld who will soon rule Black Astronomy, into a man of Heiran...!!  I was trying to live...  Heeran's stepmother didn't like the way he looked and started to kill all of Heeran's people.  And Heeran went to the bottom of the Dark Astronomical Gate to the realm of the deep hell for revenge.

altTitles.ja: やんちゃギャルの安城さん

altTitles.th: คุณอันโจ หยอกนักเพราะรักนะ

description.de:
Seto ist ein total normaler und irgendwie langweiliger Schüler. Aus einem unerklärlichen Grund jedoch, lässt seine Mitschülerin Anjou ihn nicht in Ruhe! Der ernste Seto und die energische Anjou bilden ein kontrastreiches Duo, doch Anjou macht das nichts aus, da sie sehr viel Spaß hat, Seto zu necken. Andererseits hat Seto eine schwere Zeit mit Anjous Eskapaden. Wenn er doch nur wüsste, dass seine Reaktionen der Grund sind, dass Anjou weitermacht.  
  
Doch … ist ihr flirten wirklich nur gespielt …?
description.en:
Seto is a completely ordinary and somewhat boring high school student. Yet, for whatever reason, his errant gyaru classmate Anjou just won't leave him alone! The serious Seto and energetic Anjou make a contrasting duo, but Anjou doesn't seem to mind, as she has too much fun teasing him. On the other hand, Seto has a hard time dealing with all of her endless antics; little does he realize that his humorous reactions are precisely the reason Anjou enjoys his company.

But… just how much of her flirting is merely an act?

**Official English:** [emaqi - USA & Canada only](https://emaqi.com/manga/anjo-the-mischievous-gal/volumes)
description.fr: Seto est un lycéen ne souhaitant qu'une chose : passer sa scolarité sans être remarqué et être en paix. Malheureusement pour lui, il attire l'attention de la pire personne possible dans sa classe, Anjou la gal. A partir de ce jour, le quotidien de Seto va drastiquement changer grâce (ou à cause) de sa camarade, cherchant à s'amuser au dépend de notre héros.
description.ja: 真面目でクラスの中でも目立たない瀬戸くんには、なぜかいつもイケてるギャルの安城さんがいちいちエロく絡んでくる。いつもギリギリでドキドキする思春期ぴちぴちラブコメディ！
description.ru: Сето - серьёзный старшеклассник, который вел тихую школьную жизнь, пока не стал жертвой дразнилок гяру Андзё-сан.
description.pt-br:
Seto é um estudante completamente comum e um tanto chato. Mesmo assim, por alguma razão, sua nada correta colega de classe Gal Anjou simplesmente não o deixa em paz!

O Seto sério e a enérgica Anjou formam uma dupla um tanto interessante, mas Anjou não parece se importar, pois se diverte muito provocando-o. Por outro lado, Seto tem dificuldade em lidar com todas as suas travessuras intermináveis; mal ele percebe que suas reações humorísticas são precisamente o motivo pelo qual Anjou gosta de sua companhia.

Mas… quanto de seu flerte é meramente uma atuação?

title.en: Dragon Quest: The Great Adventure of Dai - Avan the Brave and the Demon King of Hellfire

altTitles.ja: ドラゴンクエスト ダイの大冒険 勇者アバンと獄炎の魔王

altTitles.ja-ro: Dragon Quest: Dai no Daibouken - Yuusha Avan to Gokuen no Maou

altTitles.ar: مهمة التنين: مغامة داي الكبرى: البطل افان و جحيم ملك الشياطين المستعر

altTitles.vi: Dragon Quest: Dũng giả Avan và Ngục viêm Ma vương

description.en: The Demon King's army led by Hadler is attacking the world. The Kingdom of Carl and Princess Flora stand up to stop the invasion. And then there's young Avan! Another heroic story begins now!

title.en: I Raised My Younger Sister Beautifully

altTitles.en: I Raised My Little Sis Beautifully

altTitles.ja: 妹を可愛く育てたら大公 様に溺愛されました

description.en: The imperial family collapsed during one night by the basilisk, the summoned beast of darkness which was summoned by the cursed princess, Fleta. “If there is a next life, then… Can I really be your younger sister?” If I had approached you a little earlier, would it have been different from now? The last time everyone regretted it, the time miraculously returned to 6 years ago. If this is the second chance we've been given.
description.ru: Императорская семья рухнула за одну ночь из-за василиска, призванного зверя тьмы, которого призвала проклятая принцесса Флета. «Если есть следующая жизнь, то… Могу ли я действительно быть твоей младшей сестрой?» Если бы я обратился к тебе немного раньше, было бы всё иначе, чем сейчас? Последний раз все об этом пожалели, время чудесным образом вернулось на 6 лет назад. Если это второй шанс, который нам дан...

altTitles.ja: ブルーロック

altTitles.th: BLUE LOCK ขังดวลแข้ง

description.de: Nach dem Aus im Achtelfinale bei der WM 2018 ruft der japanische Fußballverband ein Projekt ins Leben, das den ultimativen Stürmer erschaffen und Japan den Weltmeistertitel bringen soll: Blue Lock. Zu diesem Zweck werden die 300 talentiertesten Oberschüler versammelt, darunter auch Yoichi Isagi, ein unbeschriebenes Blatt. Kann er sich gegen die große Konkurrenz durchsetzen und Japans große Hoffnung werden?
description.en:
Yoichi Isagi lost the opportunity to go to the national high school championships because he passed to his teammate who missed instead of shooting himself. Isagi is one of 300 U-18 strikers chosen by Jinpachi Ego, a man who was hired by the Japan Football Association after the 2018 FIFA World Cup, to guide Japan to winning the World Cup by destroying Japanese football. Ego's plan is to isolate the 300 strikers into a prison-like institution called "Blue Lock", in order to create the world's biggest "egotist"/striker, which has been lacking in Japanese football.

---
**Notes:**
- **Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**

**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10008/episode/318774) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/blue-lock/)
description.fr:
Isagi Yoichi a perdu l'opportunité d'aller aux championnats nationaux des lycées parce qu'il a passé la balle à son coéquipier qui a raté son but. Isagi est l'un des 300 attaquants U-18 choisis par Ego Jinpachi, un homme qui a été embauché par la Fédération Japonaise de Football après la Coupe du Monde de la FIFA 2018, pour guider le Japon vers la victoire de la Coupe du Monde en détruisant le football japonais. Le plan d'Ego est d'isoler les 300 attaquants dans une institution semblable à une prison appelée "Blue Lock", afin de créer le plus grand "égoïste"/attaquant du monde, ce qui fait défaut dans le football japonais.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.pl:
Piłkarskie battle royale – tak można opisać całą tę historię.  
Z powodu niepowodzeń na mistrzostwach świata, Japoński Związek Piłki Nożnej postanawia wdrożyć program, dzięki któremu uda się stworzyć rewolucyjnego napastnika.  
Yoichi Isagi otrzymuje zaproszenie do wzięcia udziału w tym właśnie programie. Zamknięty w placówce o nazwie Blue Lock, będzie walczył z 299 innymi graczami i starał się zostać najlepszym napastnikiem na świecie.
description.vi: Blue Lock (ブルーロック Burū Rokku) hay Dự án bồi dưỡng cầu thủ đặc biệt là một dự án chuyên đào tạo những tiền đạo trẻ từ khắp nơi trên đất nước Nhật Bản, bao gồm 3 vòng tuyển chọn chính và các vòng phụ. Dự án này có sự tham gia của 300 tiền đạo trẻ và họ sẽ đối đầu trực tiếp với nhau trong các vòng đấu loại trực tiếp.
description.pt-br: Yoichi Isagi perdeu a oportunidade de ir para o campeonato nacional do ensino médio porque ele passou para seu companheiro de equipe que perdeu em vez de chutar para o gol si mesmo. Isagi é um dos 300 atacantes de Sub-18 escolhidos por Jinpachi Ego, contratado pela Associação de Futebol do Japão após a Copa do Mundo de 2018, para guiar o Japão na conquista da Copa do Mundo ao destruir o futebol japonês. O plano de Ego é isolar os 300 atacantes em uma instituição parecida com uma prisão chamada “Blue Lock”, para criar o maior “egoista” / atacante do mundo, que tem faltado no futebol japonês.

title.en: It's Over! Empress’ Husband is Actually Invincible

altTitles.zh: 完了啊！女帝的软饭丈夫居然无敌

altTitles.zh-ro: Wanliao Ah! Nvdi De Ruan Fan Zhangfu Juran Wudi

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

Ye Ji-an, the only S-class guide in Korea, was often called the “useless guide” due to her unique trait of having a 0% matching rate with all espers. After failing to match with an esper from Russia and on her way back home, she is suddenly swept away by a gate manifestation and wakes up alone in a strange temple-like place. The world she has traveled to through the gate is the continent of Wisrode, filled only with espers, and in this place, Ji-an is the only guide…

altTitles.ja: ろくでなしBLUES

description.en:
Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
description.es:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.
description.vi:
Maeda Taison, chàng thiếu niên tới từ Osaka mang trong mình ước mơ trở thành nhà vô địch boxing thế giới. Xuyên suốt 3 năm học của cậu không chỉ là những trận đánh, những xung đột mà còn có cả những câu chuyện đầy tính nhân văn.
Huyền thoại của dòng manga yankee Nhật Bản, dù đã kết thúc từ năm 1997 nhưng Rokudenashi Blues (RB) vẫn đang là bộ manga yankee bán chạy nhất mọi thời đại. Vì kết thúc đã lâu nên nội dung của nó có phần "outdate", tuy nhiên vẫn rất đáng đọc.
description.es-la:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.

altTitles.ja: BUNGO―ブンゴ―

description.en: In a town with no baseball team, young Bungo spends his days throwing the ball he received as a gift against a wall until Yukio Noda, Japanese representative youth baseball player, appears before him and an unexpected showdown ensues! After a chance meeting in middle school, these two enroll in Seio Senior where they struggle to make it to Koshien with everything they have.
description.pt-br: Em uma cidade sem time de beisebol, o jovem Bungo passa seus dias jogando a bola que recebeu como presente contra uma parede até que Yukio Noda, o jogador de beisebol jovem representante japonês, aparece diante dele e um confronto inesperado acontece! Depois de um encontro casual no ensino médio, esses dois se matriculam no Seio Senior, onde lutam para chegar a Koshien com tudo o que têm.

description.en:
Humanity was designated as a disruptive species of the Cosmic Ecosystem. To reduce humanity's numbers, the universe's administrators initiate a survival game.

Jin Jaehee, having returned from the final stage of the game, reaches one clear conclusion.

"Kang Shion - only he can lead us to victory in this game."

Kang Shion, a genius with an unparalleled mind. Jin Jaehee, a regressor who lost in the survival game and returned to the past.

With the regressor as his ally, Kang Shion begins to unravel the death game with unprecedented skill.
description.ko:
우주생태교란종으로 선정된 인류. 우주의 관리자에 의해 인간의 개체수를 줄이기 위한 생존 게임이 시작된다.

그 최종 단계에서 회귀한 진재희는 한가지 결론을 내린다.

“강시온, 오직 그만이 이 게임을 승리로 이끌 수 있어.”

천재적인 두뇌의 소유자, 강시온. 생존 게임에서 패배해 과거로 돌아온 회귀자, 진재희.

회귀자를 조력자로 얻게 된 강시온은 역대급 능력으로 데스 게임을 풀어나간다.

altTitles.ja: レッド

description.en:
Set in nineteenth-century America, Red is the last living survivor of a Native American tribe that was slaughtered by white men. On a long journey in search of revenge, he travels with Iero Ito, a samurai who ran away to America after being defeated in the Seinan civil war, and Angie, a mysterious prostitute. The bonds of friendship between the three are touching. Although it is all fiction, the story seems very real as it is based on actual battles between US troops, Apaches and other tribes.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics (2005)
description.pt-br: Situado na América do século 19, Red é o último sobrevivente vivo de uma tribo nativa americana que foi massacrada por homens brancos. Em uma longa jornada em busca de vingança, ele viaja com Iero Ito, um samurai que fugiu para a América após ser derrotado na guerra civil de Seinan, e Angie, uma misteriosa prostituta. Os laços de amizade entre os três são comoventes. Embora seja tudo ficção, a história parece muito real, pois é baseada em batalhas reais entre tropas americanas, apaches e outras tribos.

altTitles.ja: バトルスタディーズ

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

altTitles.ja: GW終わっちゃった……

title.en: My Love for My Roommate Is One-Sided

altTitles.ja: 同居人に片思いしてる百合漫画

altTitles.ja-ro: Doukyonin ni Kataomoi Shiteru Yuri Manga

altTitles.ja: ウィンドブレイカー

description.en: Haruka Sakura wants nothing to do with weaklings—he's only interested in the strongest of the strong. He's just started at Furin High School, a school of degenerates known only for their brawling strength—strength they use to protect their town from anyone who wishes it ill. But Haruka's not interested in being a hero or being part of any sort of team—he just wants to fight his way to the top!
description.fr:
Haruka Sakura est le genre de lycéen qui fait passer la baston avant les révisions. Fraîchement débarqué en ville, c'est donc le sourire aux lèvres qu'il compte pousser les portes du lycée Fûrin, l'établissement scolaire au pire taux de délinquance du pays... Les intentions de Haruka sont claires : se mesurer aux meilleurs bagarreurs de ce bahut et devenir le meilleur de tous ! Mais entre-temps, il se retrouve mêlé à une altercation avec une bande de brutes dans un des quartiers de la ville, avant d'être sauvé in extremis par des élèves de son lycée. Haruka réalise alors à quel genre de phénomènes il risque d'avoir affaire...

Maison d'édition FR : Pika
description.ja: 彼らは、最強の不良軍団。そして、街の英雄───。偏差値は最底辺、喧嘩は最強。超不良校として名高い学校・風鈴（ふうりん）高校。この春、そんな風鈴のトップを目指して街にやってきた風鈴高校１年生・桜遥（さくらはるか）は、風鈴高校が“防風鈴（ボウフウリン）”と名付けられた街を守る集団となっていたことを知る。そして桜は、風鈴の一員として街を守るため戦い始めることに──！　不良高校生・桜の喧嘩英雄伝説、開幕!!
description.pt-br: A Fûrin High School ganhou a pior reputação entre as escolas da região por ter a média mais baixa e os alunos mais rebeldes. E nela ingressa Haruka Sakura, um jovem que acaba de chegar na cidade, que busca ser o mais forte para poder proteger todos com quem se importa. Para atingir seu objetivo, porém, a primeira coisa que ele deve fazer é se juntar a uma gangue chamada Wind Breaker, que representa seu instituto e cujo objetivo é defender a cidade de outras gangues e bandidos. No entanto, para que eles o aceitem, ele terá que ganhar o respeito deles com os punhos!

altTitles.ja: ワールドトリガー
ワートリ

description.en:
A gate to another dimension has burst open, and from it emerge gigantic invincible creatures that threaten all of humanity. Earth's only defense is a mysterious group of warriors who have co-opted the alien technology in order to fight back!  
  
**Please Note:** Chapters 111-114 are only available as licensed versions.
description.pt-br: Um portão para outra dimensão se abriu, e dele emergiu todo tipo de criatura poderosa e gigante que ameaça toda a humanidade. A única defesa da Terra é um misterioso grupo de guerreiros que faz uso da tecnologia alienígena a fim de lutar contra eles.

altTitles.ja: 悪霊 シュトヘル

description.en:
Beginning of the 13th century, Western Xia state in Chinese mainland. 
In those days existed a woman warrior named Shut Hell, the Evil One, feared even by the Mongols, reputed the strongest army in history. 
At first she was just a normal Tangut soldier, but after coming close to death so many times she found a superhuman strength in herself. 
On the other side Yurul, a young Mongol prince, is fascinated by the Tangut, his enemies' writing script, and is worried for their future…
Centuries later a Japanese high school student named Shudo is haunted by a vivid dream of a battlefield...
Is there some sort of bound between these completely different lives ? Will they manage to overcome the obstacles surrounding them ?


- **2012 Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize (New Creator) winner**
description.pt-br: Um Jovem chamado Sudou desperta em uma de suas vidas passadas onde ele era uma guerreira Xia chamada Shut Hell a maligna, temida até pelos Mongóis de Genghis Khan que estão unindo forças para acabar com a dinastia Xia Ocidental. a história ocorre no Século 13 onde a Maligna junto com a principe Yurul se esforçam para preservar Xia e sua cultura e escritas.

altTitles.ja: 税金で買った本
Books bought with tax

description.en: Ishidaira is a delinquent who visited the library for the first time since elementary school. But then, he was pointed out by Hayasemaru and Shirai, who works at the library, that he has not returned a book that he borrowed ten years ago. A manga about how Ishidaira went from trying to borrow a book from a library to working there instead.
description.pt-br: Ishidaira é um delinquente que visitou a biblioteca pela primeira vez desde o ensino fundamental. Mas então, ele foi apontado por Hayasemaru e Shirai, que trabalha na biblioteca, que ele não devolveu um livro que pegou emprestado dez anos atrás. Um mangá sobre como Ishidaira passou de tentar pegar um livro emprestado de uma biblioteca para trabalhar lá.

altTitles.ja: にじいろフォトグラフ

description.en: Yamabuki Aoi is an exceedingly withdrawn first-year high school student who lives together with her older sister Satsuki, a popular novelist. What will happen to their daily lives when, due to certain circumstances, Sara Flory, a little foreign girl, begins to live together with them?
description.it: Yamabuki Aoi è una studentessa del primo anno delle superiori, eccessivamente timorosa che vive con sua sorella maggiore Satsuki, una famosa scrittrice. Date varie circostanze Sara Flory, una bimba straniera inizierà a vivere con loro.. Come influirà questa novità nelle routine delle due sorelle? Cosa accadrà?
description.es-la: Yamabuki Aoi es una estudiante de secundaria de primer año sumamente retraída que vive junta con su hermana mayor Satsuki, una novelista popular. ¿Qué pasará con su vida diaria cuando, debido a ciertas circunstancias, Sara Flory, una pequeña niña extranjera, comience a vivir con ellos?

altTitles.ja: ちえりの恋は8メートル

altTitles.pt-br: O amor de Chieri tem 8 metros

description.en: An ordinary high school student, Yumeji Kotaki, is transferred to his class by his childhood friend, Chieri Omine, who has grown to 8 meters in height! Yumeji is assigned as "caretaker" to support Chieri's school life. Their daily life is full of excitement due to the height difference! The height difference is nothing to worry about!
description.ja: 普通の高校生・小滝夢路のクラスに転校してきたのは、身長が8メートルに巨大化した幼馴染・大峰ちえりだった！ちえりの学校生活のサポートをする「お手伝いさん」を任された夢路。身長差がある二人の日常はドキドキがいっぱいで!?　高低差もなんのその！
description.pt-br:
Uma aluna transferida que tem 8 metros de altura...?! 
Amigos de infância se reencontram, mas nem tudo é como antes… Uma mudança na relação entre Chieri e Yumeji, acompanhe o desenrolar desta comédia romântica gigantesca.

title.en: The Girl with a Kansai Accent and the Pure Boy

altTitles.ja: 関西弁お姉さんと純真少年
The Girl with Kansai-accent and the Pure Boy

altTitles.en: The Kansai Dialect Older Girl & The Pure Boy

description.en: Kizuki-kun, a serious boy who grew up in Toukyou, moves to Oosaka to attend middle school. He lives for free with a friend of his mother's, a Kansai-dialect-speaking chatty adult older girl!
description.pt:
Um garoto se muda de sua cidade, uma amiga de sua mãe com um forte sotaque de Kansaiben cuida dele.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/bakuyahuro)  
- [Author's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/128583)

title.en: Damedol to Sekai ni Hitori Dake no Fan

altTitles.ja: ダメドルと世界に1人だけのファン

altTitles.ja-ro: Damedol to Sekai ni Hitori Dake no Fan

altTitles.en: The Useless Idol and Her Only Fan in the World
A Useless Idol and the Only Fan in the World

altTitles.id: Idol Gak Guna dan Penggemar Satu-satunya di Dunia

altTitles.es-la: Una Idol inútil y su único fan en el mundo

altTitles.pt-br: Uma Idol Inútil E Seu Único Fã No Mundo

altTitles.en: Damedol and the Only Fan in the World

description.en:
"Urumin" is an idol, but she can't sing or dance well, and she's got a dishonest character. Kimiya is the only fan in the world who likes her. The relationship between the two of them is a little different from the usual relationships between idols and fans! 

This is a "precious" love comedy that depicts the daily life of a bad idol and the man who keeps on promoting her, and the way he loves her!
description.ja: "うるみん"はアイドルなのに歌も踊りもダメダメで性格も素直じゃない。そんな彼女を推している世界で一人だけのファン、キミヤ。ふたりの関係性は普通のアイドル、ファンとの関係性と違ってちょっと変！？ダメなアイドルと彼女を推し続ける男の日常を描く、愛し方がすごい「尊い」系ラブコメディ！
description.pt-br: “Urumin” é uma idol, mas ela não consegue cantar nem dançar bem e não costuma ser sincera com seus reais sentimentos. “Kimiya” é seu único fã. A relação entre eles é um pouco diferente das relações normais entre fãs e ídolos! Esta é uma comédia romântica que retrata a vida diária de uma idol completamente desajeitada e o homem que continua a apoiá-la, demonstrando seu fanatismo até nos piores momentos!

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！アンソロジーコミック

description.en:
Bocchi the Rock! anthology by various mangaka.

---
**Volume 1**
**Cover**: [Chiba Sadoru](https://mangadex.org/author/d5f4317f-c206-4421-b87e-581d65d86c13)
**Illustrations**: [Matsuda Hikari](https://mangadex.org/author/d024d115-01fd-45d7-b92f-0af7434fd4c9/matsuda-hikari), [Uzaki Uso](https://mangadex.org/author/ed1f402e-0550-446a-b3d5-8cfee979104c), Instant, [Hoshi](https://mangadex.org/author/7f08c8d4-98a3-4fee-92ff-7f618c6ab63a), [Souma Hajime](https://mangadex.org/author/4f2c1169-ad59-444c-a0a9-dab195ee35f6), HOJI, Iwawa (イワワ)

**Author list**:
1. Yuichi
2. Takeo Kyuujuu
3. Shirou Urayama
4. Totsuno Takahide
5. Uraya Nagi
6. Uchino Maiko
7. Confure
8. Fuku Kitsune
9. kashmir
10. Oomameda
**Extra comics**: Kokamumo, Konparu & Fujishima Pepo

In Aeria, a place where people from various worlds are summoned, the weak are destined to die.

Lee Sungmin, a talentless mercenary, was no exception. Fortunately for him, a mysterious item he finds before his untimely death sends him back to the past.

Now a 13-year-old with a second chance at life, Sungmin begins his desperate journey to become Aeria's strongest with no money or talent.

Will effort alone be enough to make a hero of a boy with absolutely nothing?
description.ko:
이세계 '에리아'에 소환된 평범한 중학생 이성민.
아무런 재능도 기연도 없이 오로지 살아남기 위해 갖은 고초를 겪으며 십수년을 버티지만, 결국 비참하게 목숨을 잃고 만다.

그러나 죽기 전, 우연히 손에 얻은 '전생의 돌'에 의해 과거로 회귀하게 되고
다시금 새로운 삶을 손에 얻게 된다.

그러나 여전히 재능도 뭣도 없는 쥐뿔도 없는 인생.
범접할 수 없는 천재들에게 번번이 높은 벽을 느끼고
강한 열등감에 시달리지만,
포기하지 않고 굳은 의지와 결심으로 한 걸음씩 나아간다.

"어떻게든 발버둥 쳐서라도, 전생보다 나은 삶을 살겠어!"

인기 웹소설 <쥐뿔도 없는 회귀> 웹툰화!

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A5%90%EB%BF%94%EB%8F%84-%EC%97%86%EB%8A%94-%ED%9A%8C%EA%B7%80/2799)

title.en: Class Ten'i de Ore dake Haburareta no de, Doukyuusei Harem Tsukuru Koto ni shita

altTitles.ja: クラス転移で俺だけハブられたので、同級生ハーレム作ることにした

altTitles.en: Upon being Exiled from my Class I Decided to Make my Own Harem of my Classmates
Because I was Excluded Out of the Class Transfer, I Decided Make a Classmate Harem
After being Transported, I was Singled Out and Rejected by my Classmates so, I Made Them all Part of my Harem

description.en: When Kirishima Ran and his classmates were transported to another world they each received an ability. However the ability he received, [Sexual Lunatic], has caused nothing but trouble for him. His ability allows him to make any girl he comes in contact with his slave. Because of his ability, his classmates have shunned him and forced him to separate from them. With the fires of revenge burning inside his heart, Kirishima decides to overtake the class from the shadows. One by one he turns his classmates into slaves and fill his desires.
description.ja: クラスまるごと異世界転移で魔王討伐を目差せ!!…のはずが、女を魅了できる特殊スキルを手に入れてしまった霧島蘭は、その力を警戒したクラスメイトたちに追放されてしまう…。復讐＆生き残りのためにハーレムを作れ!?

altTitles.ja: のあ先輩はともだち。

altTitles.en: Noa is My Senior, and My Friend.

description.en:
A bitter and painful adult's life needs "friends".  Set in a game company, Rihito Otsuka (23), who is your everyday salaryman, and Noa Saotome (27), the ultimate career woman. Two characters whose lives aren't supposed to intersect become "friends" by chance.  A little sweet and slightly heavy office "friends" comedy begins!

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.ja:
苦くて辛いオトナの人生にこそ、“ともだち”が必要だ。ゲーム会社を舞台に、仕事も人付き合いも“ほどほど”が身上の「平熱さとり系」大塚理人(23)と、何事にも全力すぎる「限界バリキャリ」早乙女望愛(27)。交わらないキャラのふたりが、ひょんなことから「友達」に…？　少し甘くて若干重めな「オフィス”ともだち”コメディ」スタート！

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.ru:
«Друзья» необходимы в горькой и мучительной жизни взрослого человека.

История, происходящая в игровой компании, разворачивается вокруг Рихито Оцуки (23 года), который «умерен» в своей работе и социальных взаимодействиях, и Ноа Саотомэ (27 лет), карьеристки, которая выкладывается на полную во всём, что делает. И эти два непересекающихся характера случайно становятся «друзьями»?.. И так начинается немного сладкая и тяжеловатая «офисно-дружеская» комедия!

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.es-la:
La vida amarga y dolorosa de los adultos necesita amistades. Ambientado en una compañía de videojuegos, Rihito Otsuka, un oficinista de 23 años. Que es normal socializando y trabajando. Y Noa Saotome de 27, que lo da todo en todo lo que hace. Dos personaje que a priori no encajan... ¿Pueden ser amigos por casualidad? 
¡Comienza una dulce y pequeña pero pesada comedia sobre amigos de oficina!

title.en: My Wife Is the Demon Queen

altTitles.es-la: Mi esposa es una reina demonio

altTitles.ne: मेरी श्रीमती दैत्य को रानी हो

altTitles.ja-ro: My Wife Is a Demon Queen

description.en:
Listen up folks! I’m living my life with the Demon Queen!  
  
A normal powerless male protagonist is entrusted to look after the fallen Demon Queen Isabella. Depleted of her powers, Isabella is forced to camouflage as a human and suppress her regal status. Evil masterminds plot to dethrone the powerful Demon Queen in a medieval fantasy land.

altTitles.ja: ぼくたちのリメイク

description.en:
Hashiba Kyouya is a 28 year old game developer. With his company going bankrupt, and him losing his job, he returns to his hometown. Looking at the success of creators of his age, he finds himself regretting his life decisions as he lay distressed on his bed. But when he opens his eyes, he finds that he has travelled 10 years back to the time before he entered college.  
  
Will he finally make things right? This is a story about a failed person who is given a second opportunity to follow his dreams.

[Official Site](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/10834108156679858281)
description.ja: しがないゲームディレクター・橋場恭也28歳。なんとか支えてきた会社はついに倒産、ゲーム作りに憧れながらも人生を後悔していると、何故か10年前…2006年の自分に戻っていた!? 恭也は憧れのトップクリエイターの出身芸大に進み、今度こそクリエイターへの道を目指すが…。

altTitles.ja: しあわせ鳥見んぐ

description.en:
Suzu, an art student in a creative rut, finds new inspiration when she meets a beautiful girl at the park who introduces her to the colourful world of birdwatching.  
  
Serialised monthly in Manga Time Kirara.

Byul, a popular alpha and a first-year high school student, once trained to be an idol but has since left that path to attend school like a regular kid. His world takes an unexpected turn with the sudden birth of a younger sibling, introducing new challenges to his daily routine. Byul's childhood friend, Siwoo, has secretly harbored feelings for him for years. However, both being alphas, Siwoo has kept his emotions hidden.

As the two navigate their growing closeness after a period of time apart, Byul faces adolescence head-on, grappling with friendships, family relationships, and his sense of identity. Along the way, he rediscovers his passion for music and begins to mature through these transformative experiences.
description.pl:
"Byul, popularny alfa i uczeń pierwszej klasy liceum, kiedyś trenował, aby zostać idolem, ale od tego czasu porzucił tę ścieżkę, aby uczęszczać do szkoły jak zwykłe dziecko. Jego świat przybiera nieoczekiwany obrót wraz z nagłymi narodzinami młodszego rodzeństwa, wprowadzając nowe wyzwania do jego codziennej rutyny. Przyjaciel Byula z dzieciństwa, Siwoo, od lat skrycie żywi do niego uczucia. Jednak Siwoo, będąc alfą, ukrywał swoje emocje.

Podczas gdy obaj radzą sobie z rosnącą bliskością po okresie rozłąki, Byul staje twarzą w twarz z dorastaniem, zmagając się z przyjaźniami, relacjami rodzinnymi i poczuciem tożsamości. Po drodze na nowo odkrywa swoją pasję do muzyki i zaczyna dojrzewać dzięki tym transformującym doświadczeniom".

altTitles.ja: Ueki no Housoku
うえきの法則

description.en:
A group of powerful beings called tenkaijin are holding a special tournament. The rules of the game–each tenkaijin selects a kid in junior high to be his champion and grants him a special power. The kids take each other on in heated battle, but if they hurt innocent bystanders, then they lose one of their natural-given abilities. Every time they win a battle, they gain a new ability. The ultimate winner of the tournament is granted any power of his choosing, and the tenkajin who he represents succeeds in becoming the next god. Kosuke Ueki has been chosen to fight in the tournament. His special power–the ability to turn garbage into trees.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **The Law of Ueki** (2006)

altTitles.ja: 他校のボーイッシュ彼女

description.en: Daichi and Akira have been childhood friends forever but have only started dating recently. While Akira is very much a tomboy, there are some parts of her that are surprisingly girly?

altTitles.ja: ヴィジランテ-僕のヒーローアカデミアILLEGALS-

altTitles.ja-ro: Vigilante: Boku no Hero Academia Illegals

description.en:
In the world of Kouhei Horikoshi's Boku no Hero Academia, nearly everyone in the world has powers known as "Quirks". Normally, the law enforces the rule that citizens cannot use their Quirks out in the open, and that privilege is reserved only for registered superheroes. However, a select few have chosen to reject this rule. They are known as vigilantes - people with the hearts of heroes, but the reputation of villains.   
  
This is their story.
description.pt: Spin off de Boku no Hero Academia que tem como protagonistas os Vigilantes!
description.ru: Второй спин-офф популярного сёнена «Моя геройская академия», повествующий о «героях-нелегалах», вершащих правосудие без лицензии профессионального героя.
description.pt-br:
Vivendo em uma sociedade super-humana, é difícil se sentir especial. Mais ainda quando os holofotes são reservados aos heróis profissionais, aqueles legalmente autorizados a usar seus poderes especiais conhecidos como "Individualidades" em público e para o bem maior.

Koichi Haimawari cresceu aspirando a vida de herói, mas com uma habilidade medíocre como "deslizar" que o prende ao chão, ele logo percebeu que só poderia os admirar de baixo. Ainda assim, Koichi se contenta em utilizar seus poderes para fazer boas ações no dia a dia, como devolver itens perdidos e ajudar idosas a atravessar a rua.

Contudo, a vida pacata de Koichi iria mudar abruptamente quando ele é resgatado de uma briga em um beco por um "vigilante", ou herói ilegal, Knuckleduster. Vendo potencial heroico em Koichi, Knuckleduster requisita a sua ajuda em buscar a fonte de uma perigosa droga conhecida como "Trigger" que intensifica as Individualidades do usuário ao custo de sua racionalidade.

Se passando em um tempo antes da historia original, My Hero Academia: Vigilantes segue Koichi quando ele decide aceitar a reputação de vilão e se tornar um vigilante, trabalhando nas sombras da lei para impedir que o crime tome conta da superfície.
(My Anime List)

altTitles.ja: 異剣戦記ヴェルンディオ

altTitles.es-la: Völundio: Saga de las espadas divergentes

altTitles.vi: Volundio - Sử thi về mộng kiếm

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

altTitles.zh-ro: Si Ling Fashi! Wo Ji Shi Tianzai
Sǐ Líng Fǎshī! Wǒ Jí Shì Tiānzāi

description.en:
In a world where magic and monsters exist, Lin Moyu has hit the age of acquiring his very own profession. While most would be lucky just to obtain a high-level combat class, Moyu becomes the ultrarare necromancer!

Being the first and only one of his kind, he has no idea of the potential he possesses on his journey to level up and face great challenges.

What new heights will Moyu achieve with his unique army of undead?
description.zh: 游戏降临现实，世界规则颠覆，人类进入全民转职时代。 唯有成为转职者！升级变强！方能站上世界之巅！ 转职当天，林默语成为唯一性隐藏职业，死灵法师。 从此召唤物不死绝，林默语便不会死。 “我高坐骸骨神座，行走生死之间。” “我即是天灾！”

title.en: At the End of the Road

altTitles.ja: その先にあるもの

description.en:
After a car accident, Taemin finds himself in the body of Siwon, who was a victim of bullying at school. No longer a pushover, he starts standing up for himself but then meets Woojin, an old friend from the past. Somehow, Woojin immediately picks up Tamin's 'scent' from Siwon. What happened between these two in the past and how will it affect their future?

---
- [Original Book <Yes24>](http://www.yes24.com/Product/Goods/72104857)

- [Original Book <Aladin>](https://www.aladin.co.kr/shop/wproduct.aspx?ItemId=189230382)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/_end)
description.fr:
Après un accident de voiture, Tae Min se retrouve dans le corps de Siwon, victime d'intimidation à l'école. Tae Min n'a cependant pas l'intention de se laisser tourmenter et commence à se défendre, mais rencontre WooJin, un vieil ami du passé.  
  
Que s'est-il produit entre ces deux-là dans le passé et comment cela affectera-t-il leur avenir ?

---
- [Original Book <Yes24>](http://www.yes24.com/Product/Goods/72104857)

- [Original Book <Aladin>](https://www.aladin.co.kr/shop/wproduct.aspx?ItemId=189230382)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/_end)
